TopicTitle: Won't start - RenderTexture.Create failed: width & height must be larger than 0

Articles.Content:
buildID.txt contents:

build id = 00642

2014-10-07_11-15-09

Branch: master

version (from readme.txt): 0.25.0

settings.cfg

~/Library/Logs/Unity/Player.log

uname -mrsv: Darwin 14.0.0 Darwin Kernel Version 14.0.0: Sat Sep 27 03:58:47 PDT 2014; root:xnu-2782.1.97~11/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

sw_vers -productVersion: 10.10

basic system info:

Model Name: MacBook Pro

Processor Name: Intel Core i7

Total Number of Cores: 4

SMC Version (system): 2.19f12

If more info is needed, I can provide as necessary, but those system reports now contain a scary amount of extra stuff.

Installed and run using Steam.

Basically, I start using Steam and the logs say that it's loading. The menu music plays, and I get this over and over with no actual UI:

RenderTexture.Create failed: width & height must be larger than 0


(Filename:  Line: 204)

No dialog appears or anything (even when forcing windowed in settings.cfg via FULLSCREEN = False.

Edited October 22, 2014 by FuzziBear
solved the issue by removing settings
I can't believe I didn't try that... It worked! Thanks heaps
